pkgmetadata.longdescription: Practical Functions for Biostatistics Beginners // A set of user- friendly functions designed to fill gaps in existing introductory biostatistics R tools, making it easier for newcomers to perform basic biostatistical analyses without needing advanced programming skills. The methods implemented in this package are based on the works: Connor (1987) doi:10.2307/2531961 Fleiss, Levin, Paik (2013, ISBN:978-1-118-62561-3) Levin Chen (1999) doi:10.1080/00031305.1999.10474431 McNemar (1947) doi:10.1007/BF02295996.
